content: {"name": "Riverside Assembly Of God ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "They don't have a regular food pantry, its occasional that whenever someone donates them they conduct a day of distribution and update the hours on social media (Facebook, Instagram) usually on major holidays. https://www.facebook.com/riversideelc/\n\nFirst come first serve basis", "email": "", "url": "https://riversidecares.org/index.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "317 3rd Street", "address_2": null, "city": "The Village", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7234695, "longitude": -74.0487222}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 798-0642", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Offers fresh produce upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Pop up food pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
